entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
